resources.string:
Watch out!

This option is only for testing. If you change this value to higher, the app could take longer time mining the hashes, your device will use more CPU and it could be frozen. If this happens, close the app and try to clear the storage data to restore the values or press the 'Restore and open' shortcut. Pressing and holding the app icon.

 Note: The app will be restarted to apply the change.
